channel.title: Projects on SA
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on SA

item.title: Alisp
item.description: Alisp is a general purpose lisp based language written in C++ over the course of several months. It comes with an interpreter, REPL environment, and several modules that comprise the standard library of the language.

item.title: Code manager
item.description: A command line utility that helps me manage my git repositories as well as other programming packages.

item.title: CTGraph
item.description: Single header library for doing fancy things at compile-time.
